text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: They called it the Derby with the greatest racers of all time.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: Among such amazing runners, no one thought of her as special.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: But she knew who she was.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
To leave her past defeats behind, she unleashed all her being into 
the final sprint and, in a burst of blinding light, stood victorious at the 
finish.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: That light had a name—Eishin Flash.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
The strongest are always those who believe in themselves and follow 
their own path.

For Winning Ticket, the first race of the Classics, the Satsuki Sho, 
ends in failure.
The day after her defeat…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff… Phew…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: What was next, incline training?

She's training like any other day, though I told her it's okay to rest 
right after a race.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, I'm fine.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You know, I kinda feel like I can't take a break, even for a day… 
Ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: So I'm gonna get on with incline training!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
She always lets her feelings take the wheel, so I thought she'd be all 
like, "Nooo, I lost!"

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But she doesn't seem to have her normal boundless energy. Losing the 
Satsuki Sho must've been a tremendous shock.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: 'Cause it means she could lose the Derby next.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer, make sure to keep an eye on her please.
I say that, but I have no idea what to do for Winning Ticket right now.
I go back to my office after training to find her in there.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer.
Did you forget something?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: No, just thought I'd watch a racing video.

She's watching another Derby video. She comes here to do that 
pretty often.

But before, she would always get choked up and start yelling about 
how emotional it is. This time she's just sitting here quiet as a mouse.
choice_data_list: Next it'll be your turn to race in the Derby.
Next it'll be your turn to race in the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wha?! O-oh, right… Yeah. I'll be in the race I've been watching since 
forever.

Usually she can't calm down once she starts talking about the Derby, 
but she seems uneasy about something today.
I'm sorry we didn't win the Satsuki Sho…
I'm sorry we didn't win the Satsuki Sho…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer? Can I say something pretty obvious?
Like what?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: In racing, there's times when you lose, huh?
That's true, but we work hard so that doesn't happen, right?
That's true, but we work hard so that doesn't happen, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but I tried my hardest in the Satsuki Sho. I did everything I 
could have.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Still… it wasn't enough. I feel like I finally understand how hard racing 
really is.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
So now the videos I was always so excited to watch… It's like they've 
turned into something else.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I used to see the racers who lost and get all worked up like it was 
some big theater performance.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But I had no idea what they were really feeling. How it felt when their 
dreams were shattered…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, ha ha… Guess I'm a little on edge!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Welp, I'd better get back soon or the dorm head will get pretty mad! 
See you tomorrow!

She's gone, and the room falls silent except for the sound of the 
Derby video still playing.
